author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PRISCILLA STILL A TROPICAL STORM... ...SIGNIFICANT RISK OF FLASH FLOODING ACROSS THE SOUTHWEST UNITED STATES THROUGH THE WEEKEND...
summary: ...PRISCILLA STILL A TROPICAL STORM... ...SIGNIFICANT RISK OF FLASH FLOODING ACROSS THE SOUTHWEST UNITED STATES THROUGH THE WEEKEND... As of 2:00 AM PDT Fri Oct 10 the center of Priscilla was located near 25.5, -115.2 with movement N at 6 mph. The minimum central pressure was 994 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
